title: Writing and Toilette Table
description: Writing and Toilette Table; Jean-François Oeben (French, born Germany, 1721 - 1763, master 1761); Paris, France; about 1754; Oak veneered with kingwood, amaranth, tulipwood, and other stained and natural exotic woods; leather; silk; gilt-bronze mounts; 71.1 x 80 x 42.8 cm (28 x 31 1/2 x 16 7/8 in.); 71.DA.103; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
